title: Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador
description: As a Microsoft Learn Student Ambassador, I help students create robust tech communities, develop technical and career skills, and organize learning events.

title: DevChangeMakers
description: Facilitated collaboration, organized events, and cultivated a supportive environment for students to learn and grow together.

title: TensorFlow User Group Bangladesh
description: Supported the TensorFlow User Group in hosting events and sharing knowledge about TensorFlow applications and advancements.

title: Josephite Math Club
description: Designed posters for events like the Josephite Math Mania 2018. A 1x1 version of my poster was featured in the renowned newspaper Prothom Alo.
